title: Cheesecake with quark
ingredients: ['For the base', '250g margarine', '220g caster sugar', '5 eggs', '375g plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', 'For the filling', '1kg quark', '250g butter, softened', '5 eggs, separated', '220g caster sugar', '2 tablespoons potato flour', '1 teaspoon lemon extract', '100g raisins', '120 to 150ml milk, as needed']
